attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/exclusive-spell.png} tip={Exclusive Spell (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind (1st Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/longsword-mastery.png} tip={Longsword Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/advanced-longsword-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Longsword Mastery (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind-iv.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind IV (4th Job)} val={+57}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/true-eye.png} tip={True Eye (4th Job)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+40%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} val={+6% when hit up to +30%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind (1st Job)} val={+5%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind-ii.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind II (2nd Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind-iii.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind III (3rd Job)} val={+10%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/advanced-longsword-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Longsword Mastery (4th Job)} val={+6%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind-iv.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind IV (4th Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/weapon-aura.png} tip={Weapon Aura (5th Job)} val={+6%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+15% to certain skills (refer to skill)}>

buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-2.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Single Strike Keen Blade (4th Job)}>(10s recharge / 30s cd) <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/plum-tree-aroma.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Plum Tree Aroma (5th Job)} dur={[Up to 20s](120s cd)}>

buffInfo.binds: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/thousand-binding-plum-branches.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 5th Form: Thousand Binding Plum Branches (Hyper Skill)} dur={[10s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/ascension.png} tip={Sky Splitting Azure Dragon Sword: Ascension (6th Job)} dur={[10s](360s cd)}>

buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/link-skills/rigid-body.png} tip={Rigid Body (Link Skill)} dur={(-4%)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/dance-of-annihilation.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Dance of Annihilation (5th Job)} dur={[Up to 5s](-50% | 120s cd)}>

linkSkill.name: Rigid Body
linkSkill.shortDesc: Reduces damage taken by 4%, including attacks at a certain ratio of maximum HP

build: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-breeze-step.png} tip={Clear Breeze Step}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-breeze-mindfulness.png} tip={Clear Breeze Mindfulness}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Slash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/plum-blossom-secret.png} tip={Plum Blossom Secret}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/longsword-mastery.png} tip={Longsword Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/longsword-booster.png} tip={Longsword Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind-ii.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-strike.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/stab.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Stab}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/gentle-dash-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 1st Form: Gentle Dash}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind-iii.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/strong-body.png} tip={Strong Body}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-strike-ii.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/scattering-plums.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/vital-energy.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword 1st Form: Vital Energy}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/pierce.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Pierce}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-and-pure-mind-iv.png} tip={Clear and Pure Mind IV}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/true-eye.png} tip={True Eye}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/advanced-longsword-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Longsword Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/anima-warrior.png} tip={Anima Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/relentless-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/connected-slash.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-strike-iii.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/void-fang.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/zero-blade.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/anima-heros-will.png} tip={Anima Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-strike-reinforce.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike - Reinforce}> Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/relentless-slash-reinforce.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/relentless-slash-boss-rush.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash - Boss Rush}> Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash - Reinforce and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent-reinforce.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent-guardbreak.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent - Ignore Guard}> Lost Soul Advent - Reinforce and Guardbreak_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-strike.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/scattering-plums.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground / Void Fang / Infinite Blades (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/relentless-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/connected-slash.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash / Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Slash (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/stab.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Stab (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-strike.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/pierce.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Pierce (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/scattering-plums.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground / Void Fang / Infinite Blades (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/relentless-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/connected-slash.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash / Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade (4th Job)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Ren Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build
Skill names & skill tooltips referenced & modified from

extraContent.title: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate Skills
content: In 3rd Job, Ren unlocks access to [Lost Soul Sword Ultimate] skills that can be activated using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}> Lost Soul Advent. To activate the skills, repeatedly pressing or holding the Skill Key <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}> will cycle through each skill
Below is a list of all Lost Soul Sword Ultimate skills:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground (3rd Job)}> Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/void-fang.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang (4th Job)}> Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang (4th Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/infinite-blades.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades (Hyper Skill)}> Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades (Hyper Skill)_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-blade.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade (5th Job)}> Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade (5th Job)_>
When unlocked, the skills are also used in the same order

primary.name: Return
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Moves you to Serpent's Lake.\nCooldown: 600 sec.
details: This skill is obtained from the Ren storyline

primary.name: Shapeshift
primary.shortDesc: Hide your ears.\nCooldown: 2 seconds.
details: This skill is obtained from the Ren storyline

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Duration: 2400 sec., Attack Power & Magic ATT: +4%\nCooldown: 300 sec.
details: To obtain this skill, complete Ren's storyline

primary.name: Spirit Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Minion Duration +10%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 2

primary.name: Clear Breeze Step
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance.
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>

primary.name: Plum Blossom Secret
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 10. Jump higher up.
After using this skill, allows you to descend slowly when you hold the skill key.
Cooldown: 5 sec.
[Passive Effect: Knockback Resistance: +40%]
details: Can be used on the ground or in the air
After using, holding the Skill Key will allow you to slowly float down<bp_You can move while floating_>

primary.name: Clear Breeze Mindfulness
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +20, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +20

primary.name: Clear and Pure Mind
primary.shortDesc: Attack: +30, Critical Rate: +15%, Final Damage: +5%\nDamage Taken: -20%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 263%, Number of Attacks: 3

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword 1st Form: Gentle Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Draw your sword and teleport forwards. After drawing your sword, pressing the skill key again will sheathe it. If you sheathe the sword, teleport backwards.\n[Passive Effect: Max HP: +10%]
primary.desc: When used, draw or sheath your sword and teleport
details: When the sword is:<bp_[Drawn] <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/gentle-dash-2.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 1st Form: Gentle Dash - Draw (2nd Job)}>: Teleport forwards_[Sheathed] <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/gentle-dash-3.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 1st Form: Gentle Dash - Sheath (2nd Job)}>: Teleport backwards_>
The sword will remain drawn or sheathed until the skill is used again

primary.name: Longsword Booster
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration: 200 sec., Longsword Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike
primary.shortDesc: When Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental or Dance of Annihilation hits an enemy, Chance to create sword slash: 35%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 300%, Number of Attacks: 4\nIf the enemy hit is already defeated, it will activate at the character's location.
primary.desc: Successful attacks from Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental skills or <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/dance-of-annihilation.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Dance of Annihilation (5th Job)}> have a chance to deal an additional slash attack

primary.name: Longsword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Longsword Mastery: +50%, Attack: +30

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: STR: +60

primary.name: Clear and Pure Mind II
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Pierce
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 408%, Number of Attacks: 4

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums
primary.shortDesc: When landing direct skill attacks, there is a 35% chance to create 5 plum blossom petals that deal 120% damage 3 times.\nDamage against Normal Monsters: +120% points.
primary.desc: Successful direct skill attacks have a chance to create petals that seek out enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage by a flat amount to regular monsters

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike II
primary.shortDesc: When Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental or Dance of Annihilation hits an enemy, Chance to create sword slash: 35%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 4\nIf the enemy hit is already defeated, it will activate at the character's location.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword 1st Form: Vital Energy
primary.shortDesc: Grants a 35% chance when attacking to restore 2.2% Max HP when triggered and activate a buff.\nDuration: 4 sec., Status Resistance: +100.\nCooldown: 6 sec.
primary.desc: Grants successful direct attacks a chance to restore %Max HP and gain a buff that increases Status Resistance

primary.name: Lost Soul Advent
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 15 sec., For each Ultimate, press the skill key to use the Lost Soul Sword Ultimates you have learned.\nThe Ultimates will be used in the order of Splitting Ground, Void Fang, Infinite Blades, and Soul Blade.\nCooldown: 20 sec.
primary.desc: Press the Skill Key repeatedly to unleash each learned Lost Soul Sword Ultimate attack
details: The attacks are activated in the following order: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/void-fang.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/infinite-blades.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-blade.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade (5th Job)}>
Cooldown starts upon first using the skill and is displayed as an outline on the Skill Key

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 10. Afterwards, activates a shockwave, Damage: 689%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 10.
primary.desc: Slash around and unleash a shockwave forward
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Clear and Pure Mind III
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Critical Rate: +10%, Final Damage: +10%

primary.name: Strong Body
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +200, Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%, Knockback Resistance: +60%.\nDamage Taken: -20%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 9, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 168%, Number of Attacks: 5
details: Can move, jump, and use <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-breeze-step.png} tip={Clear Breeze Step (1st Job)}> while attacking

primary.name: Mischief
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, determines Keen Blades's form\nCooldown: 1 sec.
primary.desc: Using the Arrow Keys, choose between the two attacks: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blssom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> or <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-2.png} tip={Plum Blssom Sword 3rd Form: Single Strike Keen Blade (4th Job)}>

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, summon a sword, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 590%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Swords: 1
The sword can be created up to 28 times, including the first cast. Only up to 3 hits can occur against a single enemy.
1 Sword is prepared every 10 seconds and you can hold up to 2.
If you switch between Keen Blade and Single Strike Keen Blade, you cannot use the skill during Single Strike Keen Blade's cooldown, and all of Keen Blade's prepared swords will be reset.
--------Single Strike Keen Blade--------
MP Cost: 80, summon a sword, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 210%, Number of Attacks: 7. Up to 20 hits can occur against a single enemy.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
primary.desc: The attack has two possible forms chosen using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/mischief.png} tip={Mischief (4th Job)}>:
details: [Regular] <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blssom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}>: Summon a spinning sword that travels back and forward a fixed distance and damages enemies in its path<bp_Travels up to 28 times and a single enemy can only be hit 3 times_>

[Single Strike] <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-2.png} tip={Plum Blssom Sword 3rd Form: Single Strike Keen Blade (4th Job)}>: Summon a spinning sword that slowly travels forward and damages enemies in its path<bp_A single enemy can only be hit up to 20 times_>
Swapping forms will activate the skill's cooldown or reset the charges held

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Invincibility Duration: 3 sec.\nMax Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 395%, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 70 sec.
primary.desc: Slash around and briefly become invincible
details: Unaffected by cooldown resets and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike III
primary.shortDesc: When Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental or Dance of Annihilation hits an enemy, Chance to create sword slash: 35%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 743%, Number of Attacks: 4\nIf the enemy hit is already defeated, it will activate at the character's location.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 60% chance to deal 209% Final Attack damage 2 time(s).
primary.desc: Successful direct attacks have a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1251%, Number of Attacks: 9
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Anima Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Grandis Goddess appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Anima Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Advanced Longsword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Longsword Mastery: +70%, Attack: +30, Final Damage: +6%
details: Additionally, grants flat Attack and increases %Final Damage

primary.name: Clear and Pure Mind IV
primary.shortDesc: Attack: +57, Final Damage: +20%

primary.name: True Eye
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +10%, Critical Damage: +10%, Ignore DEF: +40%

hyperPassive.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike - Reinforce
Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike - Guardbreak
Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike - Extra Target
Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash - Reinforce
Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash - Ignore Guard
Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash - Boss Rush
Lost Soul Advent - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/void-fang.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/infinite-blades.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-blade.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Lost Soul Advent - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/void-fang.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/infinite-blades.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-blade.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade (5th Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Lost Soul Advent - Critical Rate
details: Increases %Crit Rate of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/void-fang.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/infinite-blades.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-blade.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade (5th Job)}>

hyperActive.name: Plum Blossom Sword 5th Form: Thousand Binding Plum Branches
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 720%, Number of Attacks: 12.
Stun Duration: 10 sec
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Thousand Binding Plum Branches.
Cooldown: 120 sec.

hyperActive.name: Elevation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
Duration: 30 sec.
When used, Lost Soul Advent's cooldown and the Lost Soul Sword Ultimate stage progress are instantly reset.
During the buff, Lost Soul Advent can be used 3 times during Lost Soul Advent's cooldown.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
hyperActive.desc: When used, resets the cooldown and progression of <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}>
details: While active, <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}> can be used up to 3 times during the skill's cooldown

hyperActive.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 380%, Number of Attacks: 7, Number of Strikes: 8\nEnemies hit by the blades periodically take 250% damage 3 times for 5 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Slash forward violently and apply a damaging debuff to enemies hit
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}>

fifthMain.name: Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Plum Tree Aroma
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 20 sec.
While the buff is active, when direct attacking skills hit an enemy, activate Plum Slash.
Plum Slash: Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 280%, Number of Attacks: 3.
The Plum Blossom Tree will bloom based on the number of Plum Slash activations.
Bloom: When Plum Slash is activated 30/70/125 times, the tree will bloom and create 20/40/65 Plum Blossom Flowers respectively.
Plum Blossom Flower: Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 3
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Place down a stationary tree and grants a buff where successful direct attacks activate a [Plum Slash] attack
details: While summoned, the tree will bloom (up to 3 times) when activating a set amount of [Plum Slash] and creates [Plum Blossom Flowers] that seek out enemies<bp_The tree disappears upon fully blooming but the buff will remain for the set duration_>
Attacks priortize bosses with the highest HP

fifthMain.name: Lost Soul Awakening
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, Duration: 20 sec.
When your directly attacking skills hit an enemy, activate Heavenly Fang. When Heavenly Fang is activated 90 times, Heavenly Punishment will be activated.
Every 3 hits with Relentless Slash, HEXA Relentless Slash, Dance of Annihilation, Keen Blade, HEXA Keen Blade, Single Strike Keen Blade, or HEXA Single Strike Keen Blade count as 1 successful activation.
Heavenly Fang: attack up to 12 enemies for 600% damage 2 time(s)
Heavenly Punishment: Activate 9 Chase Cuts that deal 1950% damage to up to 15 enemies 12 times
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While active, successful direct attacks activate a [Heavenly Fang] attack
details: Upon activating [Heavenly Fang] a set amount of times, unleashes [Heavenly Punishment] attack<bp_Every 3 successful hits from the following skills count as 1 activation: <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/relentless-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hexa-relentless-slash.png} tip={HEXA Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash (6th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/dance-of-annihilation.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Dance of Annihilation (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hexa-keen-blade-1.png} tip={HEXA Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (6th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-2.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Single Strike Keen Blade (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/hexa-keen-blade-2.png} tip={HEXA Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Single Strike Keen Blade (6th Job)}>_>
Attacks prioritize bosses with the highest HP

fifthMain.name: Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Dance of Annihilation
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Max Key-Down Duration: 5 sec, Damage: 1050%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 15.\nDamage taken while the key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%\nCooldown: 120 sec.
details: Can move, jump, and use <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/clear-breeze-step.png} tip={Clear Breeze Step (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}> while attacking<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}> will not have a casting or action delay_>
While held, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance), and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses

fifthMain.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 120. Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 10.
Fire 12 swords that deal 1500% damage 3 time(s).
Additional DEF Ignored: 20%.
Cooldown: 1 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Release a shockwave and create swords that seek out enemies
details: Skill is activated by using <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/lost-soul-advent.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent (3rd Job)}>
Swords created prioritize bosses with the highest HP and are unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/relentless-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 11, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 289%, Number of Attacks: 5

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/soul-strike.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/connected-slash.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash / Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade (4th Job) (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike
masteryCore.shortDesc: When Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental or Dance of Annihilation hits an enemy, Chance to create sword slash: 35%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1210%, Number of Attacks: 4\nIf the enemy hit is already defeated, it will activate at the character's location.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash
masteryCore.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Has a 62% chance to deal 325% Final Attack damage 2 time(s).

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/splitting-ground.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground / Void Fang / Infinite Blades (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Advent
masteryCore.shortDesc: When Lost Soul Sword Ultimate skills hit enemies 8 times, activate 2 sword slashes on up to 8 enemies that deal 1380% damage 5 time(s).\nEach sword slash can only hit a single enemy 1 time.\nAdditional DEF Ignored: 20%

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 1150%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 10. Afterwards, activates a shockwave, Damage: 1350%, Number of Attacks: 7, Max Enemies Hit: 10.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 2250%, Number of Attacks: 9

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 610%, Number of Attacks: 7, Number of Strikes: 8\nEnemies hit by the blades periodically take 415% damage 3 times for 5 sec.

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/scattering-plums.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/anima/ren/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums
masteryCore.shortDesc: When landing direct skill attacks, there is a 35% chance to create 5 plum blossom petals that deal 180% damage 3 times.\nDamage against Normal Monsters: +270% points.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, summon a sword, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1020%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Swords: 1
The sword can be created up to 28 times, including the first cast. Only up to 3 hits can occur against a single enemy.
1 Sword is prepared every 10 seconds and you can hold up to 2.
If you switch between HEXA Keen Blade and HEXA Single Strike Keen Blade, you cannot use the skill during HEXA Single Strike Keen Blade's cooldown, and all of HEXA Keen Blade's prepared swords will be reset.
--------Single Strike Keen Blade--------
MP Cost: 80, summon a sword, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 366%, Number of Attacks: 7. Up to 20 hits can occur against a single enemy.
Cooldown: 30 sec.

originSkill.name: Sky Splitting Azure Dragon Sword: Ascension
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500,  invincible during casting
Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Shockwaves: 58
Afterwards, Damage: 2100%, Number of Attacks: 15, Number of Strikes: 27, Max Enemies Hit: 15
Cooldown: 360 sec.

meta: Ren is a STR warrior class part of the Anima class group. Ren uses Swords as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Ren can equip Wish-Granting Jewels
